title: Put LoL in french
body: I am on NA server in english. I know its possible to put LoL in french. I try to modify the rads/system/local file for put fr_fr like i saw on youtube but its not working.. Somebody can help me plz?

replies.body:
Unfortunately, the NA region does not *officially support* French, therefore I am unable to assist you in making any sort of manual modifications to enable this.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
Can you put that in the next patch? A lot of french people in NA... a lot.
Downvoted? Okay, I don't have to share how to do legal mods.

Thx man ! I know that but i think with the new client, I can't do that. I try, but don't work for me.

:(

Yeah, I just checked. It doesn't work with the new client, sadly. :(

But it still works with the legacy one. Guess you just gotta use that if you really want French for the duration of the Beta.
Can I ask why? I have never been able to get an answer to this. There are people in North America with French as the language they interact with most in daily life.
